Cell.Data: If some concepts in the text are unclear or do not make sense, try looking that concept up in this xml as the text in this xml serves as an encyclopeadia you have a good chance of finding it. Unclear terms can be found in the AoW_Glossary. Do not change anything that is between [ and ] because it could break the hyperlink and strip it of its function. Anything between straight brackets - i.e. [ ] - is a formatting tag. Do not change these tags and keep them in the same relative position in the text. Anything between curly brackets - i.e. { } - is a place where text or numbers will be inserted by the game. Do not change the tag, but feel free to change its position in the text to suit the localized text.
List of all Oathbound Weapons and Mods
所有誓约者武器和模块列表
List of all Oathbound Hero Skills
所有誓约者英雄技能列表

{XML_SPECIES_OATHBOUND@RACE@DESCRIPTION}[br/][br/]ORIGIN: On the data hub world Archanon-8, the archvivists surviving the Cataclysm had the knowledge base covering thousands of planets and millennia of history at their disposal. Using their highly advanced simulation and prediction system Oracle, they began to construct their new utopian society, where noble Paladins in powerful battlesuits rule and protect the people with benevolent will. The archivists themselves took on the roles of an advisory caste called the Seers. Perfecting their link to Oracle over time, they learned to predict and manipulate the future, both in society and battle.

{XML_SPECIES_OATHBOUND@RACE@DESCRIPTION}[br/][br/]起源：在数据中心世界阿查农-8 号星上，从大灾变幸存下来的档案管理员拥有着涵盖无数行星和千年历史的知识库。他们利用高度先进的模拟和预测系统“神谕”建立了新的乌托邦社会。在那里，身穿强大机甲的高贵帕拉丁以坚定的意志统治并保护人民。档案保管员自身则承担起了顾问的角色，被称为“预言者”。随着时间的推移，他们与神谕的联系不断完善，逐渐学会了预测和操纵社会与战斗的未来。
Imperial Archives description of the Oathbound

Galactic Empire allows you to found your own empire and expand it by conquering different worlds. The Empire features a number of different systems on top of the regular Age of Wonders: Planetfall gameplay:[br/][br/][bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003F300000255]World Traits & Secondary Objectives[/hyperlink][br/][tab/]Worlds are generated based on your total empire level, combining different Traits and adding secondary objectives that increase difficulty while your empire grows in size.[/bullet][br/][bullet][hyperlink,000003F300000254]The Hall of Heroes[/hyperlink][br/][tab/]Where you can recruit Commanders to fight for your empire either as Commanders leading the charge or as Heroes who join the fray down on the planet.[/bullet][br/][bullet][hyperlink,000003F300000256]The Reliquary[/hyperlink][br/][tab/]Where you collect different Relics that represent great victories, feats or achievements. These Relics serve as Requisition items to empower your planetary warfare.[/bullet][br/][bullet][hyperlink,000003F300000257]Requisitions[/hyperlink][br/][tab/]Every Race and Secret Tech provides units, mods, operations, and doctrines from their respective tech trees that can be taken down to a planet and purchased using [favor/][hyperlink,000003F300000258]Imperial Renown[/hyperlink] to allow for greater flexibility in your approach in conquering a planet.[/bullet][br/][bullet][hyperlink,000003F300000252]Empire Progression[/hyperlink][br/][tab/]Conquering Worlds and completing Secondary objectives earns XP for Races and Secret Techs. For each level gained, a new requisition item is unlocked and the Empire Level is raised by one. This Empire level is a sum total of all Race and Secret Tech levels.[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]Galactic Empire allows you to mix and match many different elements of Planetfall and create entirely new combinations that were never possible before.[br/][br/]

玩家可以在“银河帝国”中建立自己的帝国，并通过征服不同的星球来扩展疆域。除了 Age of Wonders: Planetfall 的常规游戏玩法之外，银河帝国还拥有许多不同的系统：[br/][br/][bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003F300000255]星球特性和次要目标[/hyperlink][br/][tab/]星球根据你的整体帝国等级生成，拥有不同的特性组合，并会随着你的帝国规模扩大而增添次要目标来提升难度[/bullet][br/][bullet][hyperlink,000003F300000254]英雄大厅[/hyperlink][br/][tab/]你可以在这里招募指挥官为帝国而战。他们既可以作为指挥官带领军队冲锋，也可以作为英雄加入星球的争斗。[/bullet][br/][bullet][hyperlink,000003F300000256]圣物箱[/hyperlink][br/][tab/]你可以收集各种代表胜利、功绩与成就的遗物，这些遗物可作为增强星球军事实力的征用物品。[/bullet][br/][bullet][hyperlink,000003F300000257]征用[/hyperlink][br/][tab/]每个种族和秘密科技的科技树都会提供各自的单位、模块、行动和教义，可使用 [favor/] [hyperlink,000003F300000258]帝国声望[/hyperlink]购买，使你在征服星球时拥有更灵活的策略选择。[/bullet][br/][bullet][hyperlink,000003F300000252]帝国进度[/hyperlink][br/][tab/]征服星球并完成次要目标可获得种族和秘密科技经验值。每达到一个等级，都会解锁一个新的征用物品，帝国等级也将提高一级。帝国等级是所有种族和秘密科技等级的总和。[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]玩家可在“银河帝国”中混合搭配 Planetfall 中的多种不同元素，从而创造出前所未有的全新组合。[br/][br/]
Imperial Archives description of the Galactic Empire. EXP refers to Experience.

The Hall of Heroes allows you to create Commanders loyal to your [hyperlink,000003F300000251]Empire[/hyperlink] only. Being recruited through the Hall of Heroes means that these Commanders can serve the function of a regular hero and can be recruited as such when you are conquering a planet. Commanders that serve your Empire this way will progress separately from their leveling progress on a planet.[br/][br/]After each planet conquered (or lost/surrendered on turn 50 or later), your Commander and every Hero that fought for you and is in service of your Empire will gain a level. These levels determine their starting level when they are deployed next, up to a maximum of 20.[br/][br/]Commanders created in the Hall of Heroes will appear as Heroes during gameplay on a planet as recruitable heroes in the same way random heroes appear normally. These Commanders are mixed in with the pool of available heroes and are given priority over ones that don’t serve your empire exclusively.[br/][br/]The Hall of Heroes also allows you to change the appearance of any of the Commanders you recruited, but not their Race, Secret Tech, or Perks.[br/][br/]You can also dismiss any Commander from the Hall of Heroes. Doing so will remove any level progress they have made.

你可以在英雄大厅中创建只效忠于你[hyperlink,000003F300000251]帝国[/hyperlink]的指挥官。通过英雄大厅招募这些指挥官，意味着他们可以充当普通英雄的职务，并且在征服星球时也可以进行招募。以这种方式效忠于帝国的指挥官将与他们在星球上的升级进度区分开来。[br/][br/]在征服星球后（或是在星球遭遇失败/在第 50 个回合后投降），你的指挥官和所有参与战斗并效忠于你的帝国的英雄将获得等级提升。这些等级将决定他们在下次部署时的起始级别，最高为 20 级。[br/][br/]在英雄大厅中创建的指挥官将在游戏过程中，作为可招募的英雄出现在星球上，与常规出现的随机英雄一样。这些指挥官与可用的英雄混在同一个生成池中，但会优先于那些并非专门为你的帝国效忠的英雄出现。[br/][br/]你还可以在英雄大厅中更改招募而来的指挥官外观，但不能更改他们的种族、秘密科技或特性。[br/][br/]你还可以在英雄大厅里遣散指挥官，但这样做会删除他们取得的所有等级进度。
Imperial Archives description of the Hall of Heroes.

Conquering worlds, completing [hyperlink,000003F300000255]Secondary Objectives[/hyperlink], and finishing Empire Requests allows you to earn XP and level up Races and Secret Techs within your Empire.[br/][br/]Earning levels per Race and Secret Tech unlocks new [hyperlink,000003F300000257]Requisitions[/hyperlink] that can then be used when conquering a planet by purchasing them for [favor/][hyperlink,000003F300000258]Imperial Renown[/hyperlink]. There are different level caps for Races and Secret Techs:[br/][bulletlist][bullet]30 for Races[/bullet][br/][bullet]25 for Secret Techs[/bullet][br/][/bulletlist][br/][br/]Mods and Operations for weapon technologies are linked to the different Races:[br/][bulletlist][bullet]Amazon: Laser[/bullet][br/][bullet]Assembly: Arc[/bullet][br/][bullet]Dvar: Explosives[/bullet][br/][bullet]Kir'Ko: Biochemical[/bullet][br/][bullet]Oathbound: Entropy[/bullet][br/][bullet]Shakarn: Sonic[/bullet][br/][bullet]Syndicate: Psionic[/bullet][br/][bullet]Vanguard: Firearms[/bullet][br/][/bulletlist][br/]Weapon type upgrades are unlocked at levels 0, 10, and 20 instead of one per level. These upgrades unlock mods and operations.

征服星球、完成[hyperlink,000003F300000255]次要目标[/hyperlink]和达成帝国请求可赚取经验值，升级帝国中的种族和秘密科技。[br/][br/]各个种族和秘密科技在升级时都会解锁新的[hyperlink,000003F300000257]征用[/hyperlink]，可在征服星球时通过 [favor/] [hyperlink,000003F300000258]帝国声望[/hyperlink]来购买和使用。种族和秘密科技有不同的等级上限：[br/][bulletlist][bullet]种族为 30 级[/bullet][br/][bullet]秘密科技为 25 级[/bullet][br/][/bulletlist][br/][br/]武器科技的模块和行动与不同种族有关：[br/][bulletlist][bullet]亚马逊人：激光[/bullet][br/][bullet]半机械人：电弧[/bullet][br/][bullet]矮人：爆炸[/bullet][br/][bullet]奇尔寇：生化[/bullet][br/][bullet]誓约者：混沌[/bullet][br/][bullet]蜥蜴人：声波[/bullet][br/][bullet]辛迪加：灵能[/bullet][br/][bullet]先锋：枪炮[/bullet][br/][/bulletlist][br/]武器类型升级会在 0 级、10 级和 20 级时解锁，而非每级解锁。这些升级可解锁模块和行动。
Imperial Archives description of the Empire Progression.

Traits and Secondary objectives define the features of a colonizable planet and the quests the player is given to complete.[br/][br/]The Traits influence a planet’s layout, spawnsets, and gameplay. These are divided into 3 types:[br/][bulletlist][bullet]Features: these add specific structures, sectors, or otherwise modify the planet’s RMG.[/bullet][br/][bullet]Inhabitants: these traits affect the kind of AI players, NPC factions, and Wildlife that may be present on the planet and what their attitude towards the player will be.[/bullet][br/][bullet]Modifiers: affect the planet on a global scale. This can range from upkeep for specific unit types, to modifying operation costs or a change in income of a certain type.[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]Secondary objectives are quests the player is offered from the start. These are global objectives and will reward a player with [favor/][hyperlink,000003F300000258]Imperial Renown[/hyperlink] and experience for the relevant faction when completed. Most of these Secondary objectives will be repeatable to a certain degree. For example, if you complete an objective concerning Promethean Landmarks, you will be awarded XP for the Promethean Secret Tech for every Landmark you clear out.

特性和次要目标决定了可殖民星球的特征和需要玩家完成的任务。[br/][br/]特性会影响星球的布局、出生设定和游戏玩法。特性分为 3 种类型：[br/][bulletlist][bullet]特征：增加特定建筑、区域或以其他方式修改星球的玩法。[/bullet][br/][bullet]居民：影响可能会出现在星球上的 AI 玩家、NPC 阵营和野生动物的种类，以及他们对玩家的态度。[/bullet][br/][bullet]数值修改：对整个星球造成全局性影响，包括修改特定单位类型的维持消耗、修改行动消耗、修改某种类型的收益等。[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]次要目标是从游戏一开始就为玩家提供的任务。次要任务都是全局性目标，完成后会奖励玩家 [favor/] [hyperlink,000003F300000258]帝国声望[/hyperlink]与相关阵营的经验值。大多数次要目标在一定程度上都是可重复的。例如，如果你完成了一个与圣火地标有关的次要目标，那么你清理的每个地标都将为圣火秘密科技提供经验值奖励。
Imperial Archives description of the Traits and Secondary world objectives.

The Reliquary is where your Relics are displayed. Relics serve as trophies and visual reminders of achievements made by your [hyperlink,000003F300000251]empire[/hyperlink], and are earned by conquering planets with the relevant traits or a planet on which you claimed the relevant Grail.[br/][br/]Relics may have [hyperlink,000003F300000257]Requisitions[/hyperlink] item associated with them.
圣物箱是玩家陈列遗物的地方。遗物是你的[hyperlink,000003F300000251]帝国[/hyperlink]取得的成就和战利品的标志。遗物可通过征服具有相关特性的星球，或在星球上取得相关圣杯的方式来获得。[br/][br/]遗物可能会有与之相关的[hyperlink,000003F300000257]征用[/hyperlink]物品。
Imperial Archives description of the Reliquary.

Requisitions are items provided to you by the different Races and Secret techs in your [hyperlink,000003F300000251]Empire[/hyperlink]: units, mods, hero equipment, doctrines, and operations. More Requisitions are unlocked automatically when a Race or Secret Tech within your Empire reaches a new level.[br/][br/]Every time you go down to a planet to conquer it, you are able to choose a number of Requisitions in different categories:[br/][bulletlist][bullet]Units[/bullet][br/][bullet]Operations & Doctrines[/bullet][br/][bullet]Mods[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]Requisitions are limited in the number you can bring (up to maximum of 3 per category), and their slots beyond the first are locked until you reach specific Empire levels:[br/][largetab/][tab/]Units[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]Operations[tab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][tab/]Mods[line/][br/] [tab/]Unlocked by Default[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][tab/]Unlocked by Default[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][tab/]Unlocked by Default[br/] [tab/]Unlocks at level 5[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][tab/]Unlocks at level 10[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][tab/]Unlocks at level 15[br/] [tab/]Unlocks at level 20[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][tab/]Unlocks at level 25[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][tab/]Unlocks at level 30[br/][br/]Making use of these Requisitions requires you to purchase them from the Requisition shop on the planet using the [favor/][hyperlink,000003F300000258]Imperial Renown[/hyperlink] currency. This currency can be earned by completing Empire Requests and Secondary Objectives.[br/][br/]Units can be built in your colonies once purchased, as long as the colony has the required structure. After unlocking the unit, you can also buy the unit directly with Imperial Renown and have it appear in your capital.[br/][br/]Operations, Doctrines, and Mods only need to be purchased once, and can then be used as any other.

征用是不同种族和秘密科技提供给[hyperlink,000003F300000251]帝国[/hyperlink]的物品：包括单位、模块、英雄装备、教义和行动。当帝国中的种族或秘密科技达到新的等级时，将自动解锁更多征用。[br/][br/]玩家在征服星球时，可以选择各种不同类型的征用：[br/][bulletlist][bullet]单位[/bullet][br/][bullet]行动与教义[/bullet][br/][bullet]模块[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]可携带的征用数量设有限制（每个类型最多 3 个），当第一个征用槽位被占用之后，后面的槽位将会被锁定，直到你的帝国达到特定等级：[br/][largetab/][tab/]单位[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/]行动[tab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][tab/]模块[line/][br/][tab/]默认解锁[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][tab/]默认解锁[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][tab/]默认解锁[br/][tab/]5 级解锁[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][tab/]10 级解锁[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][tab/]15 级解锁[br/][tab/]20 级解锁[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][tab/]25 级解锁[largetab/][largetab/][largetab/][tab/]30 级解锁[br/][br/]使用这些征用需要花费 [favor/] [hyperlink,000003F300000258]帝国声望[/hyperlink]从星球上的征用商店中购买，你可以通过完成帝国请求和次要目标来赚取这种货币。[br/][br/]购买单位后，只要殖民地拥有单位所需的建筑，你就可以在殖民地中建造该单位。解锁单位后，你也可以直接使用帝国声望购买该单位，购买后的单位将出现在你的首都。[br/][br/]行动、教义和模块只需购买一次即可生效。
Imperial Archives description of the Requisitions.

[favor/]Imperial Renown is a currency available only when playing with an [hyperlink,000003F300000251]Empire[/hyperlink]. The currency is used to purchase [hyperlink,000003F300000257]Requisitions[/hyperlink] and is earned by completing Empire Requests and [hyperlink,000003F300000255]Secondary Objectives[/hyperlink].
[favor/] 帝国声望是一种货币，只能在进行[hyperlink,000003F300000251]帝国[/hyperlink]游戏模式时使用。此货币可用来购买[hyperlink,000003F300000257]征用[/hyperlink]，可通过完成帝国请求和[hyperlink,000003F300000255]次要目标[/hyperlink]的方式来获得。

These former [hyperlink,000003F600000318]Oathbound[/hyperlink] Seers and Paladins broke their Oaths and now seek the power and strength that was denied from them while bound to the Oaths. The Seers become powerful envoys of chaos, their bodies consumed by the entropy. The former Paladins fashioned weapons imbued with Chaos and employ tactics that no Oathbound would allow.[br/]They seek the Grail Configurations as a catalyst to further expand their powers.
变节者曾经也是[hyperlink,000003F600000318]誓约者[/hyperlink]的预言家和帕拉丁，如今他们打破了誓言，四处寻求被誓言束缚时失去的权力与力量。曾经的预言家成为了强大的混乱使者，身体被混沌所吞噬，而曾经的帕拉丁则制造出了充盈着混乱能量的武器，使用誓约者禁止的战术。[br/]他们寻找圣杯基阵作为催化剂来进一步扩大自己的势力。
Imperial Archives description of the Apostates

Grail Configurations are powerful structures housed within special Landmarks that allow whoever controls them to alter planetary reality.[br/]Whilst only one Configuration can been found per world, these can provide powerful bonuses to the controlling player.[br/][br/]There are five Configurations including:[br/][bulletList][bullet][hyperlink,000003E300003FBA]Law Configuration[/hyperlink] – enhances and facilitates logistical and material aspects, aiding in production and in maintaining control over troops.[/bullet][br/][bullet][hyperlink,000003E300003FC5]Unity Configuration[/hyperlink] – resolves internal societal conflict and bring out harmony, granting bonuses to happiness, influence and popular support.[/bullet][br/][bullet][hyperlink,000003E300003FCB]Life Configuration[/hyperlink] – facilitates life, granting bonuses to food production and sustains a unit's cognitive self, effectively regenerating them from damage.[/bullet][br/][bullet][hyperlink,000003E300003FD0]Knowledge Configuration[/hyperlink] – enhances computational processes and mental proficiency, granting bonuses to knowledge and operations.[/bullet][br/][bullet][hyperlink,000003E300003FD6]Potential Configuration[/hyperlink] – increases electrical efficiency, granting bonuses to energy generation and brings out the potential of owned units, increasing their damage by 50%.[/bullet][/bulletList]

圣杯基阵是功能强大的建筑，安置在特殊地标内，控制圣杯基阵之人可以重塑星球的现实。[br/]虽然每个星球只能找到一个基阵，但可为掌控此处的玩家提供强大的加成。[br/][br/]基阵共有五种，分别是：[br/][bulletList][bullet][hyperlink,000003E300003FBA]法律基阵[/hyperlink]：加强并促进后勤和物质方面，协助生产并维持对部队的控制。[/bullet][br/][bullet][hyperlink,000003E300003FC5]团结基阵[/hyperlink]：解决内部社会冲突并实现和谐，提供额外幸福值、影响力和民众支持。[/bullet][br/][bullet][hyperlink,000003E300003FCB]生命基阵[/hyperlink]：促进生命，提供粮食生产加成，维持单位的自我认知，并有效治疗单位受到的伤害。[/bullet][br/][bullet][hyperlink,000003E300003FD0]知识基阵[/hyperlink]：提高计算过程和心理能力，给予知识和行动加成。[/bullet][br/][bullet][hyperlink,000003E300003FD6]。潜能基阵[/hyperlink]：提高电气效率，为能量生成提供加成，并增加所有操控单位 50% 的伤害。[/bullet][/bulletList]

[hyperlink,000003F600000318]Oathbound[/hyperlink] Heroes and any Hero under the control of an [hyperlink,000003F600000318]Oathbound[/hyperlink] player have access to special Colony Lord Hero Skills. Heroes with these skills can be assigned to be the Lord or Lady of a colony. These skills give two economic bonuses to the colony the Lord or Lady is assigned to: one that's always active, and one that's active only when the Hero is present in their colony's domain. 50% of the latter bonus can be retained while the Hero is not in the colony's domain by building a Throne in that colony.[br/][br/]You can assign a Hero to a colony using the portrait on the left of a colony's name when you have a colony selected.

[hyperlink,000003F600000318]誓约者[/hyperlink]英雄和所有受[hyperlink,000003F600000318]誓约者[/hyperlink]玩家控制的英雄都可以使用特殊的殖民地领主英雄技能，拥有这些技能的英雄可以被指派为殖民地的领主。这些技能会为领主所在的殖民地带去两种经济加成：一种始终生效，另一种仅会在该英雄出现在其殖民地领地之中时才会生效。当英雄不在殖民地的领域内时，可通过在该殖民地建造王座的方式来保留第二种加成 50% 的效果。[br/][br/]选择殖民地，然后点击殖民地名称左侧的头像即可指派英雄至殖民地。

Heroes in your [hyperlink,000003F300000251]Galactic Empire[/hyperlink] gain powerful bonuses once they reach level 2 in the [hyperlink,000003F300000254]Hall of Heroes[/hyperlink]. These command abilities become more powerful as their level in the [hyperlink,000003F300000254]Hall of Heroes[/hyperlink] goes up:[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Level 2-4[largetab/]Imperial Veteran[/bullet][bullet]Level 5-7[largetab/]Imperial Champion[/bullet][bullet]Level 8-10[largetab/]Imperial Hero[/bullet][bullet]Level 11+[largetab/]Imperial Lord[/bullet][/bulletList][br/][br/]There are 4 different traits that a hero can gain, depending on which equipment loadout the hero takes when they are created. Note that reaching the Lord rank gives an extra, powerful bonus![br/][br/][bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003EB00000323]Soldier[/hyperlink][largetab/]Gives army wide bonuses to damage and morale[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003EB0000033D]Juggernaut[/hyperlink][largetab/]Gives army wide bonuses to armor and health[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003EB00000355]Sniper[/hyperlink][largetab/]Gives army wide bonuses to accuracy and critical hits[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003EB00000368]Pilot[/hyperlink][largetab/]Gives army wide bonuses to shields and regeneration[/bullet][/bulletList]

[hyperlink,000003F300000251]银河帝国[/hyperlink]中的英雄在[hyperlink,000003F300000254]英雄大厅[/hyperlink]中达到 2 级即可获得强力的加成。随着他们在[hyperlink,000003F300000254]英雄大厅[/hyperlink]中等级的提升，这些命令技能会变得更加强大：[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]2-4 级[largetab/]帝国老兵[/bullet][bullet]5-7 级[largetab/]帝国勇士[/bullet][bullet]8-10 级[largetab/]帝国英雄[/bullet][bullet]11 级以上[largetab/]帝国领主[/bullet][/bulletList][br/][br/]英雄可获得 4 种不同的特性，取决于创建英雄时所使用的装备。注意，达到“领主”等级将获得额外的强大加成！[br/][br/][bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003EB00000323]士兵[/hyperlink][largetab/]给予军队规模的伤害和士气加成[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003EB0000033D]主宰[/hyperlink][largetab/]给予军队规模的护甲和生命值加成[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003EB00000355]狙击手[/hyperlink][largetab/]给予军队规模的准度和暴击加成[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,000003EB00000368]机师[/hyperlink][largetab/]给予军队规模的护盾和恢复力加成[/bullet][/bulletList]
See EmpireBonusTraits.xml for these terms being defined in game
